content:
This sounds interesting for anyone who likes category theory and condensed matter physics:

Topological Orders and Higher Structures

August 3 - 7, 2020

We will gather people from topological phases of matters, high energy, field theory, and higher category theory, with mini-courses, talks and breakout rooms, to discuss and exchange rapid development and interaction emerging in/between these domains.

Details can be found on our website https://www.esi.ac.at/events/e399/

Please register as described in the homepage or equivalently here

https://forms.gle/8rWhwdUSxNN7LY4K6

Then you will receive zoom links and passwords to all talks and breakout sessions (these are for you to discuss with the speakers) two days before the workshop. The deadline for registration is also two days before the event.

Have fun!

--Best regards, Chenchang Zhu on behalf of organisers

Anton Alekseev (U Genève)
Stefan Fredenhagen (U Vienna)
Nicolai Reshetikhin (UC, Berkeley)
Thomas Strobl (U Lyon)
Chenchang Zhu (U Göttingen)
